itunes:title: overcoming hardships + setbacks with kylie ross
title: overcoming hardships + setbacks with kylie ross
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
description:
This week, britt is bringing the one and only Kylie Ross behind the mic for some fun & gains! Kylie talks about college soccer, overcoming injuries, training for life outside of sports, building confidence, summer goals, owning what makes you unique & more!

Train with Britt Start Your 7 Day Free Trial Today!

Shop Gymshark Shop my favorite Gym Fits!

2:28 gym ick

7:20 sports

9:20 mental me-time

11:30 trying pilates

14:20 gym vibes

15:29 Kylie’s app

20:10 secret project

23:00 overcoming injuries

31:30 hot girl/healthy girl summer

32:40 summer tips

36:20 share a goal for summer

37:15 confidence = keeping promises

40:27 rapid fire Q’s

41:50 best sweet tooth cravings

41:58 sports bra

44:00 bloating

49:00 cellulite

53:00 selflessness through motherhood

54:00 advice Kylie would give her younger self 

54:20 own your uniqueness
